title: Contraception: ready or not?
brief_description: An internationally acclaimed program for teenagers developed to encourage responsible attitudes towards sex. It is not a comprehensive description of contraception methods but designed to stimulate discussion on issues surrounding contraceptive use. Features a reporter interviewing a sperm, an ovum and a group of teenagers to reveal the myths, misconceptions and truths about contraception. Accompanied by a 10p. Workbook.
